description: The Localization and Mapping Platform (LAMP) software fuses radiation and contextual data to produce 3-D maps that locate and identify gamma-ray emitting sources in complex environments. It enables data collection, fusion, and processing in near-real-time and on-board in several configurations, including handheld and unmanned aerial system (UAS) form factors.
name: Localization and Mapping Platform Software (LAMP Software) v1

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
